column2:

Gear.Club is much more than a quick adrenaline rush; it is an authentic world of cars. Realistic driving experience, with fully simulated engines, powertrains, suspensions and aerodynamics. 

*** #1 Free App in 88 countries - #1 Free Game in 96 countries - #1 Racing in 145 countries ***

You will get to explore breathtaking settings and compete live with your online friends and foes through unlimited races, championships and events.  

Gear.Club offers a full range of options for the cars. Players can collect, upgrade and customize some of the most gorgeous exotic vehicles in their performance shop and enjoy details including engine and interiors in full HD.

FEATURES:

●	DRIVE with fully simulated engines, powertrains, suspensions and aerodynamics. Multiple control schemes are supported!
●	EXPLORE breathtaking settings and exotic locations.
●	RACE against your Friends through Events and Championships. 
●	CREATE and develop the ultimate Performance Shop to collect, upgrade and customize the most gorgeous exotic cars. 
●	ENGINEER specific parts to boost your machines beyond their maximum capacity. 
●	ADMIRE car details such as engines and interiors shown in Full HD!
●	COLLECT all your favorite cars.

COMPATIBILITY: Gear.Club currently supports iPad 4, iPad Air and higher, iPad Pro, iPad Mini 2 and higher, iPhone 5 and higher, iPhone SE and iPod 6 running on iOS 8 and higher due to memory constraints.

PLEASE NOTE! Gear.Club is completely free to download and play but some game items may be purchased for real money. To disable this, turn off the in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

The file-size of Gear.Club is quite significant so make sure your Internet connection is stable when installing the game.

http://www.facebook.com/gearclubthegame
Watch Gear.Club on https://www.youtube.com/c/EdenGamesOfficial

GRIFFIN ROCK RESCUE bands together with a few new teammates to track down a mysterious Mini-Con whose arrival in Griffin Rock sparks a thrilling race throughout the town. This interactive storybook app puts you side-by-side with CODY and the RESCUE BOTS team—even BUMBLEBEE is here to help—as they track down this devious visitor. This adventure sparks team spirit, burns a lot of rubber, and raises important questions for, BLURR, our newest RESCUE BOT recruit: What’s more important? The rescue mission or a ‘need for speed?’
	
•	Take control by picking the Bot YOU want leading each mission!
•	Hunt for clues across Griffin Rock! 
•	Race your fellow Bots to hunt down the rogue Cybertronian!

Feel like a member of the team as CODY guides you and GRIFFIN ROCK RESCUE around town, broadcasting updates as you power through seven different activities, racing from one side of the island to the other, dodging laughing gas, matching suspects, and gobbling up Energon cubes!  Designed for young RESCUE BOTS fans and emerging readers, this app features:

•	Interactive, animated scenes that put you in the middle of the scene!
•	Race, catch, match, and dodge through seven unique missions that propel you through the story!
•	YOU pick the best Bot for each mission! Bots include: HEATWAVE, CHASE, BUMBLEBEE, BLURR, SIDESWIPE, and QUICKSHADOW. 
•	Sticker pack of over 20 your favorite Transformers Rescue Bots to use with iMessage.


Designed to deliver these Learning Goals:

Numeracy:
•	Matching & sorting
Early Literacy:
•	New vocabulary
•	Expanding early reading skills 
•	Increasing reading comprehension

Social-Emotional
•	Teamwork
•	Problem-solving with a group

ABOUT PLAYDATE DIGITAL
PlayDate Digital Inc. is a publisher of high-quality, interactive, mobile educational software for children. PlayDate Digital's products nurture children's emerging literacy and creativity skills by turning digital screens into engaging experiences. PlayDate Digital content is built in partnership with some of the world's most trusted global brands for kids.

Visit us: playdatedigital.com
Like us: facebook.com/playdatedigital
Follow us: @playdatedigital
Watch all our app trailers: youtube.com/PlayDateDigital1

HAVE QUESTIONS? 
We'd love to hear from you! Your questions suggestions and comments are always welcome. Contact us 24/7 at info@playdatedigital.com

5/5 “I just won my first car in a pink-slip race! WOW, it was such a rush. I love this game!”
5/5 “Excellent drag racing game! It looks great and the short races are fun and addictive! I recommend it to everyone.”
5/5 “I am loving the launch mechanic. Races are won by skill, unlike other games. Incredible graphics and gameplay to match!”

Drag race across the world’s top cities behind the wheel of your favorite race machine!
Drive your best turbo-charged Supercar across the world’s most glamorous and popular cities in high-speed drag races. Raise the stakes, show your muscle, and then smash your way through rain, snowstorms or scorching heat, betting pink slips to win your rivals’ cars on amazing 3D streets.
Looking for real quick multiplayer fun? How about live 1 vs. 3 PvP free-for-all races? The harder the race, the greater the triumph!

• THE CAR COLLECTION OF YOUR DREAMS
Collect, customize and race full-power autos you've owned or the best speed machines you need to drive, ranging from classic muscle cars to new turbo Supercars. All licensed! Does that get your motor running?

 • BETTING TO WIN!
Whether you bet small on each street run or need to study your opponents before betting pink slips, this is the most fun and intense quarter-mile of drag racing you’ve ever seen. Bets are available in single-player and multiplayer PvP battles.

• 4-PLAYER DRAG RACES
Quick shift from single-player to multiplayer races fast for the live thrills and fun of challenging the world’s top driving opponents! Take part in cool races vs. 3 other players in real-time PvP clashes where only one can win, and the others will burn out in defeat.

• MIND THE WEATHER
You never know when a drag race will throw a new twist, like a blizzard, rainstorm or burning heat on the street. Each weather simulator can have a real effect on your and your rival racers’ driving. So don't lose your grip and nitro your auto over the finish line!

• RACE AROUND THE WORLD IN THE MOST STYLISH LOCATIONS
Try not to be distracted by the top-quality 3D HD environments when you need to pop a nitro canister in 3 of the world’s top cities for speed: New York, Paris and Hong Kong.

• MAKE YOUR AUTO UNIQUE!
Going for a new look? Need some quick muscle upgrades? Then feel free to browse through numerous options to customize and power up your torque, nitro or engine power. Show your racer rivals real style with fun decals, and maximize your multiplayer performance with turbo speed, motor superchargers, nitro and much more.

• OUTSTANDING GRAPHICS
Feast your eyes on the cool 3D visuals and natural light simulator. Console-level HD graphics are a classic mark of what we do!

Do you need something from some place, the market or from your favorite restaurant? Anything from the pharmacy or the store close to your home? 

And cannot have it because of time or distance or even because the shop is closed and you have no one to take it to you?

Delibear is the Communication Application where you can upload an Ad to ask or request whatever you need, wherever you are, when you want it! 

In your City, Country or Abroad through other users who offer to take it.

You can use Delibear in 7 different ways, you just need somebody!

1. Send local: What do you have left and do not want to go back?

2. Domestic Shipments: Do you need to take a piece of furniture from London to Liverpool?

3. International: Is it your son on Erasmus in Spain and want to send something from Manchester or from UK to US?

4. Ask local: What do you need? Ask for it!

5. Domestic Deliveries: Do you need something from Cardiff or want that Scottish cake you love?

6. International Orders: Did you forget something traveling and need somebody to bring it to you?

7. DIY- You can offer yourself to carry and do the orders!!


PUBLISH YOUR AD AND FIX THE PRICE FOR YOUR COMMISSION!!


1-. Make your request to deliver it where you say, to your office or directly home, without moving; if you've left something away from you, in a hotel or restaurant, ask someone to bring it back.

2-. Want to send something? The keys that you have forgotten, send your bike or surfboard to the beach house... there are thousands of possibilities for your deliveries, publish it and hope that someone offers to do it for you!



Finally it arrives directly home or to the location you choose, thanks to other people who offer to do the commission.


ADVANTAGES OF DELIBEAR


• CLOSE: Through our positioning system you can see the closest ads in your location.

• IF YOU TRAVEL: whether you're a passenger or the driver, if you have free space you have the option to indicate the app your path and see ads from users that match your trip: could it be easier *?

• IN YOUR CITY: Ask for what you need or run errands in your town or city, offering the price for orders you have near you.

• POST YOUR ADS: Publish your ad completely free and add pictures to provide more information about your publication. One user saves money and the one who perfoms the custom takes the tip.

• FAST AND EASY CONTACT: With Delibear everybody can ask questions through the public chat of each publication; once you have chosen the user to perform the task, you go over to a private chat to close the details.

• SEARCH: thanks to its functionality and accessibility, Delibear can save your searches based on your location or on your trips to keep you informed and not miss any orders.

• CHOICE OF USER: trust is very important, therefore, with Delibear you decide on the user who will do the request; you can elect the one that best suits your request because of proximity, speed or confidence among potential users that also have been offered. For your convenience, you can download from the app or the website a model contract, fill it out and sign for your safety.

• REVIEWS: trust is very important in Delibear, so we created a system in which users can be evaluated upon completion of the assignment :) which allows you to have more security before contacting someone to do your order.

Delibear is available in different languages: English, Spanish and Portuguese, and is adjusted according to the language of the operating system of your phone.

column1: Find Rescue Dogs 4 U to Adopt
column2:
Browse through hundreds of small dogs who need a new home. These dogs need your help!

App can also be used as a billboard on an iPad at your adoption or rescue center:
- In iOS "Settings", "Display & Brightness", Change "Auto-Lock" to "Never" and plug your iPad into a power source. The photos of dogs will advance automatically helping your visitors find a dog to adopt.

Dogs in this app are UP-TO-DATE, so you'll discover these dogs are available right now.

Each dog is presented with the contact information for the rescue organization or shelter.

There are 5 buttons under each dog:
"More Info" - Read a story about the history of this dog or contact the shelter for more information. (Images of dogs can be pinched & zoomed after tapping "More Info".)
" Choose Cities" - Choose one or more cities near you to show dogs in those cities.
"Share" - Share dogs in iMessage, Email, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and other apps you have installed
"Text" - Add yourself or people from your contacts to instantly send them a text message when you see a dog you or they might like (this feature is handy when using an iPad as a billboard.)
"Search" - Search for dogs that have been previously displayed.

Tapping anywhere else on the screen works the same as the "More Info" button.

Swipe right or left to move between dogs or swipe up or down with your thumb when using an iPhone with a single hand.  App works in both portrait and landscape orientations.

Your  *LOVE* will help rescue these poor babies from the shelters.  Let's work together to make the USA a "no kill" country! Tell your friends about  this app, and share as many of these dogs as you can on social media with your friends.
https://bestfriends.org/resources/no-kill-animal-shelters

Costa Eventi is Your Personal Guide to the Amalfi Coast

Are you spending some time in the Amalfi Coast? Or are you going to?

If you are, this App is a must.

All you need to know to enjoy your time, in the Amalfi Coast, at the best:

• let you drive among all the 14 Amalfi Coast TOWNS’ histories and discover their MAIN SIGHTS and PLACES OF INTEREST

• keep you posted on all the EVENTS taking place all over the Amalfi Coast, currently or next, according to your own interests: festivals, live concerts, art galleries, clubbing and much more

• all the EXCURSIONS through the mountains and along the coast will make discover you some of the most breathtaking landscapes in the world

• all of these can be localized by means of a multi-functional MAPS system, as not to get lost among the typical narrow streets of Amalfi Coast

• turn on your location services and discover what is nearer to you thanks to the section AROUND YOU

• find out the best restaurants, bars, clubs, hotels, B&Bs, shops and beaches and their offers to enjoy at the best your journey

• an accurate WEATHER forecast allows to plan your indoor or outdoor activities, day by day

• check all the BUS and BOATS TIMETABLES in order to choose your favourite means of transport and organize your daily schedule in the suitable way as possible

• as an alternative, call a TAXI or RENT a scooter, a boat or a car

• all information about HOW TO REACH AMALFI COAST by the nearest Airports, Railway Stations, Ports and by your own Car

• listen to the official radio of the Amalfi Coast

If you want to make the most of your time in Amalfi Coast, this App can not miss on your smartphone

Enjoy the Amalfi Coast!

NB. Turning on the Radio, the App will work in the same way in background mode, with the relative consumption of battery and internet roaming

Mail：wangjingjing@showbabyapp.com

************ Presentation ************
Tactical game for 2 players. The goal is to align at least 4 tokens of the same color (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) .
You can play against the computer, with someone on the same device or online with game center.

************** Features **************
Choose the colors of your tokens. 

Choose the difficulty of the computer and play against him in the "1 Player" mode.

The "1 Player" mode allows you to play against the computer. The difficulty increase with the level. Be carefull with the timer otherwise you lose the game. 

The "2 Players" mode allows you to play with someone on the same device. 

The "Online" mode allows you to play with an other player connected on Game Center. The winner is the player who wins 2 rounds.
1 point is awarded for each rounds gained.
1 additional point is awarded to the winner.
If your opponent quit the game or if he is offline before the end of the game then you'll gain 1 additional point. 

********** In App Purchase ***********
Remove all advertising from the game.

With over 10 million downloads worldwide, tripwolf is one of the most popular travel guide apps in the App Store. We offer over 600 travel guides with premium content from Fodor’s Travel - including offline maps and a trip planner. And we are continually expanding our coverage.

AT A GLANCE: WHY SHOULD YOU TRAVEL WITH TRIPWOLF?
» Free preview of over 600 travel guides in German, English, French, Spanish and Italian
» Premium tips and photos from Fodor’s Travel and MARCO POLO as well as additional information from Yelp, Wikipedia & Foursquare
» Offline maps with the most important attractions, restaurants, hotels, shops, bars, museums and public transport options
» Trip Planner for optimal trip preparation – including day planning and routes on the map
» Navigate on the map and see the best route on foot, by bike or by car! Let us show you the way to the nearest attraction on your list on the map.
» Sync your travel guides and maps on up to three devices!
» Book your tickets, tours, hotels and flights directly from the tripwolf travel app

———
IN DETAIL

OFFLINE MAPS
All 600+ travel guides are available for offline use after they are downloaded. This includes the offline maps, all texts, trips and photos. To book hotels, flights or tours for attractions, you need to have an active internet connection.

PREMIUM TRAVEL GUIDE
A free preview is available for all travel guides. After upgrading, you have access to the premium content with the most important attractions, hotels, restaurants, bars, museums and public transport options as well as the offline maps as well as a range of other features.

FODOR’S TRAVEL GUIDE CONTENT
Our travel guides contain insider tips from Fodor’s Travel and MARCO POLO. Detailed descriptions, opening hours, entrance fees and other information for all attractions, restaurants, museums etc. await you! Additionally, you’ll get a perfect overview on our maps.

PREPARE YOUR VACATION WITH THE TRIP PLANNER
Thanks to Trip Planner, you can put together all the details of your trip before, or even during, your journey. Add the most important points of interest, restaurants, shops, hotels and museums to your travel guide and you’ll get the complete route as an offline map. In addition, you can also optimise your route, letting the app automatically arrange your route by distance from your departure point (i.e. hotel).

‘NEAR ME NOW’ FILTER ON THE MAPS
Filter attractions, hotels, restaurants etc. which are near you directly on the map and save time during your next city trip. Even offline!

FIND THE BEST DEALS
Should you want to book your trip from the app, that’s not a problem. Find the cheapest city tours as well as budget hotels, tour tickets for the most exciting attractions and flight tickets directly in the tripwolf app. Discover the best tours in cities such as Palma, Istanbul, Brussels, Stockholm, Bangkok or Los Angeles.

QUALITY OF THE MAPS & CONTENT
The offline map is provided by OpenStreetMap and is continuously updated. The content and photos from all other sources (Yelp, Foursquare, Wikipedia) are checked regularly and new attractions etc. are added.

OUR TOP TRAVEL GUIDES
Our most popular travel guides with offline maps at the moment are city guides such as Rome, London, Barcelona, Amsterdam, Lisbon, Vienna, Paris, New York, Hamburg, Prague, Munich, Venice, Florence, Dublin and Copenhagen as well as country and region guides such as Thailand, Mallorca, Germany, Switzerland, Italy and Portugal.

tripwolf is a small team of travel lovers based in Vienna. We offer mobile travel guides with offline maps and a trip planner for over 600 destinations. If you have any problems with our app or would like to send us some feedback, drop us a line at support@tripwolf.com and we’ll get back to you asap! Happy travels!

If you love photography or just taking selfies and photos than this is the camera app for you. Simple editor with many beautiful effects and filters.

So how does it work ?
First you need to choose if you want to make a picture or import from you gallery, also you can make awesome collages and choose from sixteen different grid frames.
On the menu you will see a Wall of Fame button, there you can post your photos so that every one using the app can see (Registration from the setting menu is required).
Go to the mirror and make a cute selfie and you will be directed to the editor from there you will crop your image and choose one of our beautiful backgrounds.
In the bottom of the editor the first button is for shapes you can change the size, transparency and choose a color.
Now you can continue and choose a sticker to put on the picture or chose a magic texture for the top of your photo.
Filters are the next thing you can choose and make the picture  perfect.
On the final editor you can adjust the brightness, level the contrast, choose saturation and exposure.

Well this is how the editor works now you can share your picture on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, by E-Mail or other apps you have installed on your device.

CoolPix will be your HD photo booth for your pictures so that you can boost your likes and followers.

Don’t forget to post the picture on the Wall of Fame.

Our Multi purpose mobile app help you to manage you daily end to end requirements in very cost effective way like cabs, taxi Electrician, painter, plumber, courier, package and mover or legal/insurance advisor.

"Need4Car" is a car sharing management platform which can be installed to any potential provider of such a service, as a white label product. It is an end-to-end product which offers the total mobility solution:
a) starting from the in-car-technology (all the necessary equipment installed to the car) together with 
b) the web application,
c) the backoffice application for the administration of the whole service. The backoffice interface offers a large set of parameters related to users, vehicles as well as tariff models and policy parameters. And finally
c) a mobile app for the final user. It has a very easy and friendly UI to use: the final user just needs 3 clicks to arrange his booking of the vehicle.

NeedMask advises you when to put on the mask during hazy conditions based on your location’s 1 hour PSI levels.

NEEDMASK - YOUR IDEAL HAZE COMPANION
Have you ever looked at the PSI readings and struggle to decide if you should wear a mask out? Struggle no more with NeedMask!

NeedMask is the ideal haze companion app that conveniently advises when you need to wear a mask RIGHT from the notifications! It calculates location based PSI readings from NEA so you get updated data throughout the day to make well-informed plans. But wait, that's not all! Launch NeedMask and it shows you exactly what activities you should avoid right now, perfect for planning a jog outside or bringing your kids to the playground. Want to see what's the PSI levels around Singapore? NeedMask shows you all the regions' readings at a glance. NeedMask even allows you to easily share PSI readings with your friends and family at the touch of a button!

Download your ideal haze companion, NeedMask now!

FEATURES:

*Award Winning
NeedMask won 2nd prize at the Hyper Haze Hack 2015 organized by NTU, with the support of Google Singapore and the SPH Professional Development Endowment Fund

*Accurate Hourly PSI
Applies PM.Haze’s 1 hour PSI (PM2.5) algorithm to deliver accurate hourly readings from NEA

*Geolocation Enabled
Finds your current location’s PSI reading to keep you well-informed

*Convenient Health Advisory
Informs you to take proper precautions right from the notifications

*Clear Activity Status
4 status icons in-app to quickly tell you if you should go jogging outdoors or have a family picnic

*All Regions PSI
Check PSI levels all around Singapore at a glance

*Share & Care
Easily share PSI data to your friends and family to make sure they are safe

*Beautiful Design & Interface
Well designed interface provides all essential data at a glance for the best experience
 
AS FEATURED ON:

- The Straits Times
- AsiaOne
- Arduino blog
- Mumbrella Asia


Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
